publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6804.1Dr Richard Simpson:International Youth Day—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6804) in the name of Annabel Goldie, insert at end ", and therefore regrets that one of the first actions of the UK coalition government in this field has been to cancel a number of UK Department for International Development-funded educational and awareness raising programmes aimed at engaging young people in the UK’s efforts in developing countries and doing so without notice or evaluation or consultation with the young people involved". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
